component:components/t-add~TAddComponent.title: TAddComponent
component:components/t-add~TAddComponent.text: Add Transformicon PUBLIC  animation string - Set the add animation type (alias: a). types - minus | check   is-added boolean - Set initial open added state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add.  {{! These are functionally equivalent}} <TAdd /> <TAdd @a='minus' /> <TAdd @animation='minus' /> <TAdd @is-added={{false}} @animation='minus' />

attributes.name: TAddComponent
attributes.description:
Add Transformicon

PUBLIC

  • animation string - Set the add animation type (alias: a).
    • types - minus | check
  • is-added boolean - Set initial open added state.
  • onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add.
{{! These are functionally equivalent}}
<TAdd />
<TAdd @a='minus' />
<TAdd @animation='minus' />
<TAdd @is-added={{false}} @animation='minus' />

fields.name: _animationTypeTable
fields.description: Animation CSS classname lookup table for the Add transformicon

fields.name: animation
fields.description: Get the component's current animation type. This is used to lookup the CSS classname for the animation

accessors.name: animationType
accessors.description: Get the CSS classname corresponding to the component's current {@link animation} type

accessors.name: isAdded
accessors.description: Get the {@link transformClass} CSS classname representing the is-added toggled state for this transformicon

component:components/t-form~TFormCompone.title: TFormComponent
component:components/t-form~TFormCompone.text: Form Transformicon PUBLIC  is-searching boolean - Set initial searching state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isSearching, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is searching or not searching.   {{! These are functionally equivalent}} <TForm /> <TForm @is-searching={{false}} />

Form Transformicon

component:components/t-grid~TGridCompone.title: TGridComponent
component:components/t-grid~TGridCompone.text: Grid Transformicon PUBLIC - Optional parameters:  animation string - Set the grid animation type (alias: a). types - rearrange | collapse   is-open boolean - Set initial open grid state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed.   {{! These are functionally equivalent}} <TGrid /> <TGrid @a='rearrange' /> <TGrid @animation='rearrange' /> <TGrid @is-open={{false}} @animation='rearrange' />

attributes.name: TGridComponent
attributes.description:
Grid Transformicon

PUBLIC - Optional parameters:

  • animation string - Set the grid animation type (alias: a).
    • types - rearrange | collapse
  • is-open boolean - Set initial open grid state.
  • onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed.
  {{! These are functionally equivalent}}
  <TGrid />
  <TGrid @a='rearrange' />
  <TGrid @animation='rearrange' />
  <TGrid @is-open={{false}} @animation='rearrange' />

template:application-tailwind.title: Your Tailwind styles
template:application-tailwind.text: Your Tailwind styles A reference for every generated class in your app.

template:docs/index.title: Overview
template:docs/index.text: Overview Use Transformicon components in your Ember applications! Installation ember install ember-transformicons

template:docs/transformicons/add.title: Add Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/add.text: Add Transformicon API is-added boolean - Set initial open add state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isAdded, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending add. animation default minus (default) check is-added onclick action isAdded =

template:docs/transformicons/form.title: Form Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/form.text: Form Transformicon API is-searching boolean - Set initial searching state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isSearching, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is searching or not searching. animation is-searching onclick action isSearching =

template:docs/transformicons/grid.title: Grid Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/grid.text: Grid Transformicon API is-open boolean - Set initial open grid state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed. animation default rearrange (default) collapse is-open onclick action isGridOpen =

template:docs/transformicons/index.title: Transformicons
template:docs/transformicons/index.text: Transformicons Component API Add your favorite Transformicon component to any template in your Ember application. Global optional parameters: animation string - Set the menu animation type. If you do not provide a specific type for an icon category, then a default type will simply be provided for you. Aliases: a Components

template:docs/transformicons/mail.title: Mail Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/mail.text: Mail Transformicon API is-open boolean - Set initial open mail state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed. animation is-open onclick action hasUnreadMail =

template:docs/transformicons/menu.title: Menu Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/menu.text: Menu Transformicon API is-open boolean - Set initial open menu state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isOpen, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is open or closed. animation {} default butterfly (default) minus x-cross arrow-up arrow-360-left arrow-left is-open onclick action isMenuOpen =

template:docs/transformicons/remove.title: Remove Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/remove.text: Remove Transformicon API is-removed boolean - Set initial open removed state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isRemoved, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is pending remove. animation default check (default) chevron-left chevron-right chevron-down chevron-up is-removed onclick action isRemoved =

template:docs/transformicons/video.title: Video Transformicon
template:docs/transformicons/video.text: Video Transformicon API is-playing boolean - Set initial playing state. onclick closure action - The name of your consuming application's component/controller/route action to handle the transformicon click. Returned with 1 parameter isPlaying, which is a boolean type indicating if the current state is playing or stopped. animation is-playing onclick action isVideoPlaying =

template:index.title: Introduction
template:index.text: Introduction Transformicons markup is built with accessibility in mind. Since not all screen readers know what aria-label is yet we've chosen to include important text in a .tcon-visuallyhidden span using the HTML5 Boilerplate method that is screen reader friendly. What is a transformicon? It's an animated symbol/button/icon that morphs. Get started
